text: Chintamani Nagesa Ramachandra Rao, (born 30 June 1934), is an Indian chemist. He has worked mainly in solid-state and structural chemistry. He has written around 1,774 research publications and 56 books. He seen as a scientist who had won all possible awards in his field except the Nobel Prize in Chemistry. He was elected a foreign member of the Academia Europaea in 1997. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Indian scientists Category:Indian writers Category:Indian educators Category:Chemists Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: C. N. R. Rao
